document_data.name: ''Incense of Meditation''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Incense of meditation''''' was [[enchanted]] to focus a [[cleric]]'s [[spell]]s to their maximum effect.<ref name="DMG2R-p229-230>
document_data.Description: This item was formed into small rectangular blocks that gave off a sweet smell when burned. They appeared identical to ''[[incense of obsession]]''.
document_data.Powers: A cleric or priest who lit ''incense of mediation'' while praying for a full eight hours would find that any spell they cast would experience maximum results. The effects of this incense lasted for a full day.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Beldora Thiiruin]], the owner of the [[Maid of the Moors]] in [[Mornbryn's Shield]], carried some ''incense of meditation''.
